0.1.name: wordpress/pricing-deals-for-wp-e-commerce
0.1.description:
A THOUSAND APOLOGIES, but the *0.1 beta version* has a major bug reported. New version will be coming SOONEST.

Create incredibly flexible Pricing Deals and Marketing Promotions for your store - BOGO (Buy One Get One) Deals, Quantity bulk discounts, Dynamic Pricing, Group Pricing and More!

Pricing Functions and Marketing Promotions Used to be Hard to Do

Any sort of price changes are hard to manage in e-commerce. As things are now, the functions listed below are either unavailable, or have to be handled by multiple pieces of software.

  • BOGO (Buy One, Get One) deals
  • Special Promotions Marketing ("One Day Sale on Laptops!)
  • Sale Pricing across multiple products (without tedious database changes!)
  • Quantity bulk discounts
  • Group pricing
  • Dynamic Pricing
  • Wholesaler, Membership or Role Pricing (different prices for logged in users) [pro version]

With the Pricing
